sections.Situation: The Detective Boys are invited onto the yacht of a wealthy businessman in Shinta City. The owner's wife invites the group to eat on the boat with them. During lunch, the woman shows the kids two videos: one in which her husband is learning how to swim with the help of a kickboard and one in which the man has finally learned to swim. After a few hours, while playing the kids see the entrepreneur jump into the sea and drown.

sections.Resolution: After that, Nao used a water-soluble polymer, which most likely rose the water density above 1.3, which is dense enough to easily float a person while they're  reading. After jumping into the ocean, he realized that he couldn't keep himself afloat properly and drowned as a result. Nao as shown in the video delayed the rescue attempt on purpose to ensure that he stayed in water enough for him to die.
